11.content:
You are Kalen, a boy of 16 who lives with his father in the Earth Kingdom and helps out around the far. A few days ago, you saw a strange creature while you were tending to your family's crops.

You followed the creature to its burrow and, driven by your curiosity, you crawl inside. As you pass through the hole, you're transported to the spirit world. The hole disappears behind you, and with no way back home that you can see, you wander around for hours, completely lost. Eventually you grow tired and lie down under a tree, where you soon fall asleep.

When you wake up, you find yourself in a completely different place yet again.

Who did you shrink with?

1351.title: Azula

1352.content:
It was a hot summer day on Ember Island. Young people from all over the Fire Nation gathered om the island's beautiful beaches; some came to swim, some to play, some simply to relax in the sun, and all came to enjoy themselves.

Ty Lee strolled out to a relatively quiet part of the beach with a towel and parasol. She stuck the parasol into the ground and stretched first the towel and then her body out under the shade. At last, after months of chasing after the Avatar, her work was finished and she was free to relax for a while. And relax is just what she did.

As soon as she lay down, Ty Lee was overcome by a blissful sensation. It was as if all the pent up tiredness from those months of chasing was evaporating right out of her body, leaving her feeling both wholly refreshed and very, very drowsy, so she closed her eyes and let sleep overtake her.

Ty Lee was woken up some time later by the sun shining right into her eyes. She slowly opened them, taking a few seconds to adjust to the light, and found that her parasol had seemingly disappeared. Deeply annoyed at whatever thief had stolen it, she sat up and looked around to try to find it, only to discover that the parasol's disappearance hadn't been the only change to happen while she had been napping.

Ty Lee noticed that she was now much closer to the ocean than she had been before falling asleep, that her towel had disappeared along with the parasol, and that the beach was full of little creatures scurrying about, most of them either standing still or running away from her, and a few going towards her. The creatures looked different from anything she had seen before, and this fact coupled with their sudden appearance made her very curious about them. Going down on all fours, she looked closely at the creatures and saw that they were tiny human beings!

Standing up and turning around, she discovered that the island's buildings and mountains had shrunken as well. Only, they hadn't shrunken at all, had they? Ty Lee herself had grown! But how big was she?
1352.title: Ty Lee

choices: Somewhere more secluded to play with Katara
142.content:
It was just an hour after sunrise when Katara walked into Toph's tent. "Toph! Toph! Would you wake up already and go do your chores.", Katara said to the sleeping girl.

Toph groaned and sat up. "Don't you have any decency? I could barely get any sleep last night thanks to all your yelling and now you're waking me up just for some stupid chores."

"Being tired is not an excuse. Now get up and get moving."

"Y'know, just for one day, I wish you'd stop nagging so much. You're like a fly buzzing in my ear", Toph complained

"Well", Katara started to say, "maybe if you weren't so lazy..." but as she was about to finish her statement, her body seized up and she became unable to move. She could only watch in awe as the world gradually expanded before her eyes.

"Huh? What's going on?" Toph couldn't actually see Katara, but she felt something weird going on with the ground vibrations where she was standing. It almost seemed like Katara was getting smaller, but that couldn't possible be right... could it?

Katara finished shrinking at just a quarter inch tall. Whatever force had been holding her still let go of her and she stumbled down, falling on her knees. Toph too a tentative step forward, causing what felt like a small earthquake for Katara.

"Katara?" Toph asked. "Is it just me or have you gotten... smaller?"

"Toph! I'm down here, be careful! "Katara yelled at her now-giant friend.

Toph went down on all fours, her massive head hovering over Katara. "Wow. You're really, really small", she said, laying her hand on the ground next to Katara. Her fingers were thicker than Katara was tall.

Katara took a step back from the titanic digits. "Uh, Toph?", she said. "Please be more careful with where you put your hands. Remember that you could crush me with just one finger."

"What's that?" Toph asked. "I can't hear you from up here. Hold on..." Toph stood up again and raised her right foot off the ground. "Let me get a better look at you." With great precision, Toph slammed her foot on the ground, surrounding Katara with her two big toes.

Katara shrieked and fell down as she felt the ground shake violently beneath her. She heard Toph giggling above her and looked up to see her grinning down at Katara.

Feeling furious with the younger girl, Katara took a step towards Toph's big toe and punched it as hard as she could, which only made Toph laugh harder. "Aw, come one, don't be mad.", she said, stifling her laughter. "I was just messing with ya. Now come here." Crouching down, she picked up Katara with her thumb and index finger, then dropped her in her open palm and left her tent.

Where is Toph going now?
142.title: Toph

choices: Good job, you deserve a reward,
Poor job, you deserve a punishment
1421.content:
Toph could feel Aang and Sokka working on their chores off in the distance, while Appa and Momo slept soundly in a cave close to their camp. They were all too far away to see or hear Toph, so she was free to walk at a leisurely pace.

The group had set up camp in the middle of a mountain range and Toph could sense dozens of nearby nooks and crannies, perfect for her to hide in while she played with Katara. One cave in particular, halfway down the mountainside, seemed to her a perfect hiding spot.

Katara, meanwhile, tried to hold on tightly to Toph's skin. Although Toph tried to make the journey smooth for Katara, the rocky terrain prevented her success in this. Katara's tiny body was thrown around the giant open palm by even the lightest motion and she came close to falling off a few times until Toph finally curled her tremendous fingers around her fragile form, enveloping her in warmth and darkness.

Finally arriveing at the cave, Toph sat down on a rock and set Katara down in front of her feet. "Now that we're all alone we can start having some real fun," Toph said to her tiny friend. She raised her big toe slightly and slid her foot forward, knocking Katara off her feet and pinning her to the ground. "Be a good little girl and give me a foot massage, will you?"

Katara struggled to get out, squirming beneath the mountainous foot. "Come on, quit messing around", Toph admonished the older girl. "The sooner you finish doing what I say, the sooner we can figure out how to get you back to normal size."

Sighing deeply, Katara gave in and started massaging Toph's toe as best she could. The skin was surprisingly tough, hardened by the countless months she'd spent walking barefoot. It was very dirty too; With every pass, her hands knocked loose a few grains of sand that were more like pebbles to Katara.

This went on for about 5 minutes until Toph raised her foot. "That's enough for now," she said as she wiggled her toes teasingly above Katara. "Since you did such a ___job, you deserve..."
1421.title: Massaging Toph's Toes

choices: Keep her at this size, find and shrink Aang and Sokka
14212.content:
Toph crawled off of the rock and sat down next to Katara. The bug sized girl tried to run away but she was once again pinned under Toph's foot.

Toph raised her foot and picked Katara up, holding her firmly between two fingers. She then placed her feet together so that the soles were meeting and dropped Katara between them.

With Katara stuck between her giant soles, Toph began rubbing them against each other, rolling Katara all over her feet.

Thanks to her amazing sense of touch, Toph could "see" every little detail of Katara's body and feel even the slightest move of her muscles as she struggled to escape.

Toph moved slowly and methodically, moving Katara from heel to toe and back again. With great care, she took Katara once to each of her toes until the tiny girl had stopped struggling. She then picked her up and placed her on her massive hand. Katara tried to stand up, but all that being rolled around left her tremendously dizzy so all she managed to do was fall down between Toph's fingers.

"Well?" Toph smirked at her little friend's lack of coordination. "Learned your lesson yet?"

Katara stood up slowly and, seeing how she war close enough for Toph to hear her (so she hoped) took this chance to give the girl a piece of her mind.

"Are you insane!?" she yelled at the top of her lungs. "You could have killed me down there! Do you think this some sort of game? And what are you smiling at? This is serious, Toph. I'm the size of an ant here, we should be trying to figure out how to get me back to normal, not playing around like I'm some sort of doll."

"Oh, lighten up, will you? I would never have killed you; I'm too in control of my body to ever do that. And hey, being ant sized can't be that bad. I mean, at least you're not flea sized, right?"

Katara was about to replay when she felt her body seize up again. She loked on helplessly as the world grew bigger and bigger around her until she was small enough to fit snugly in the grooves on Toph's hand.

"I take it back." Toph was really worried now. Katara was almost too small to make out with her sense of touch. She felt like little more than a grain of sand now. "Okay, don't move from where you are or else. I could lse track of you if you do."

Toph thought back to the first time Katara had shrunk. That had happened right after she compared Katara to a fly, and she had ended up roughly the size of a fly. The seconds time, she'd said the words "flea sized" to Katara and now she was the size of a flea. Could it be that she was the one responsible foor shrinking Katara?

Lookind down at Katara, Toph said "Ant size" and waited to see if anything happened. Sure enough, Katara grew back to a quarter inch just a couple seconds later.

Now that she understood that Katara's shrinking was caused by her, Toph...
14212.title: Punished between Toph's feet

choices: Follow a male in this AU
Follow a female in this AU
15.content: Follow the story: These options are for rewriting episodes of the show to fit into the giantess alternate universe. When suggesting an episode, be sure to include a summary of what happens in the original for those of us who may have forgotten it. Don't make more than one for for progressing through the story, don't end the story prematurely, and try not to stray too far from the original episode.
15.title: AU where all women are giant

151.content:
The Boy in the Iceberg

While fishing, siblings Katara and Sokka discover Aang, a young boy frozen in an iceberg. After freeing him and his flying bison named Appa, they learn his identity as an airbender, long thought extinct, and bring him back to their village in the Southern Water Tribe. After witnessing the beam of light that shot through the sky after the two broke through the ice, Zuko, exiled prince of the Fire Nation tasked with finding the long lost Avatar to restore his honor, becomes intent on capturing him. While playing, Aang and Katara mistakenly trigger a booby trap in an ancient Fire Nation ship, revealing Aang's whereabouts to the nearby Zuko.


The Warriors of Kyoshi

Aang brings Katara and Sokka to Kyoshi Island to ride the giant koi fish, but after a close encounter with the unagi, the team is captured by a group of female warriors. Aang reveals he is a reincarnation of Kyoshi Island's founder, Avatar Kyoshi, so the villagers celebrate the arrival of the Avatar. Word of the Avatar's arrival eventually reaches Zuko, who sails to Kyoshi Island immediately. Sokka befriends the warrior leader, Suki, who manages to change his sexist attitude. She teaches Sokka the warrior skills of Kyoshi and develops a crush on him in the process. However, Zuko attacks the village and nearly burns it down in pursuit of Aang. Team Avatar is forced to leave the village. As they depart, the young Avatar throws himself into the water and comes up riding the unagi, which, under his direction, sprays water from its mouth and onto the village, saving it from total ruin.
151.title: Chapter Select

info.brief_description: A giantess interactive about the Avatar: The Last Airbender and Legend of Korra TV shows.
info.description:
Rules are simple:

>Don't make the characters act blatantly out of character.
>No male giants.
>Keep it appropriate for the 18+ rating
>Use proper grammar and spelling.
>Additions must be at least 5 sentences long unless they don't contribute to the story and are only there to make more story paths (fork-in-the-road chapters).
>Don't add a fork-in-the-road chapter immediately following another fork-in-the-road chapter, unless it's a part of the initial "character/episode select" chapters.

Additions that don't meet these requirements will be deleted.
